item.content:encoded:
How-To Geek has a nice post on creating your own Twitter style group blog with P2 (the WordPress theme). I like that they walk through how to setup P2 on both WordPress.com, the hosted service, and using the WordPress.org software.

We use P2 quite a bit at Automattic, it has become a critical part of our internal communications.
